job_description:
• Impact: We are continuously challenged to develop innovative production test solutions that are customized to Micron's needs.
• We must be more agile, robust, efficient, and capable than our competitors.
• Bachelor of Science degree in Electrical, Electronics Engineering, Computer Engineering, or equivalent Impact: Our work directly impacts Micron’s ability to ship its products on time and on budget.
• In-depth knowledge of lab equipment (oscilloscopes, DMMs, SMUs) Experience building physical systems (software + hardware) Dev Tool Experience (Jira, Git, Jenkins, Artifactory) 3+ years of experience in industry embedded work Lab equipment knowledge (oscilloscopes, DMMs) Experience in Linux and the GNU toolchain Experience with embedded software tools.
